message_1: In a charity event, there are 10 different T-shirt sizes and only 7 T-shirts available of each size. How many different ways can T-shirts be distributed among the participants if there are 70 participants in total, and each participant can only receive one T-shirt of their correct size?
message_2:
Since there are 10 different T-shirt sizes and 7 T-shirts available of each size, there are a total of 7^10 different ways to distribute the T-shirts among the 70 participants. 

7^10 = 282,475,249 different ways to distribute the T-shirts.
